line_1: Anxious each paltry relique to preserve
line_2: Of him, whose hungry friends they leave to starve,

line_1: For she, who could a tranquil mind preserve,
line_2: Form'd for ingratitude, would ill deserve

line_1: And watchful faith the flame preserve;
line_2: Hope shall have patience in reserve.

line_1: This Story, in thy Annals, still preserve,
line_2: From him let constant Lovers learn to serve:

line_1: "— Oh FITCHET — don't ask me — good Heavens preserve,
line_2: " I wish there was no such a Thing as a Nerve;
